name: Eyeless
description:
Eyeless

Year 2126.

The blue planet Earth is haunted by a mysterious phenomenon called Cracking. From the cracks appearing in the land, monsters crawl out.

Despite the appointment of a special force called Utilizers, the battle was lost. Humanity is forced to leave Earth and populate other planets.

Azriel leads the group of Utilizers that have stayed on Earth the longest, trying unsuccessfully to find the cause of the Cracks. After all is lost, he leaves Earth with his team in hope of helping other planets that still have a chance to survive.



Project made in collaboration with students from WSE - Tischner European University
